user.name: action
user.head: anni.actions
user.desc: Lists the actions available in server.

user.name: set
user.head: anni.set [tag] [your text]
user.desc:
Sets a profile option for your server. Pass the tag you find using anni.profile setup or ~set, and pass new options. Be sure to check out the dashboard for easier profile management.

anni.set tag I like to make things.

user.name: wipe
user.head: anni.set [tag] [your text]
user.desc:
Sets a profile option for your server. Pass the tag you find using anni.profile setup or ~set, and pass new options. Be sure to check out the dashboard for easier profile management.

anni.set tag I like to make things.

user.name: me
user.head: anni.me
user.desc:
Returns the general info from your profile. (No extended profile information will be shown).

anni.me

user.name: profile
user.head: anni.profile (user)
user.desc:
Without user, returns your profile.
Otherwise, returns the profile for user.

anni.birthday to set your birthday.
anni.timezone to set your timezone.

anni.profile

anni.profile @User

anni.profile setup

subs.head: anni.profile hide
subs.desc:
Makes your profile visible on a server.

anni.profile hide

subs.head: anni.profile setup
subs.desc:
Returns info for setting up your profile.

anni.profile setup

subs.head: anni.profile show
subs.desc:
Makes your profile visible on a server.

anni.profile show

user.name: birthday
user.head: anni.birthday [MM/DD][/YYYY]
user.desc:
Set your birthday on your profile.
Year is optional, providing it will also display your age.

anni.birthday 03/27

anni.birthday 10/16/2000

user.name: timezone
user.head: anni.timezone [timezone]
user.desc:
Sets your timezone to timezone.
Timezone is the nearest time city to you. For the US, it's usually Los Angeles, Denver, Chicago, and New York. If you're unsure what to input, you can visit this link and click on yourself on the map.

anni.timezone Chicago

anni.timezone Sydney

user.name: birthdays
user.head: anni.birthdays
user.desc:
Lists all the public birthdays in the server.

anni.birthdays

user.name: commands
user.head: anni.commands
user.desc: Lists the commands you have access to.

user.name: help
user.head: anni.help (command)
user.desc:
Without command, returns general help.
Otherwise, returns the help text for command.

anni.help

anni.help help

user.name: times
user.head: anni.time (time)
user.desc:
Displays the current time in the server.
You can pass a time to get the time it would be.

anni.time

anni.time 9pm

mods.name: action
mods.head: anni.action.[option] [data]
mods.desc:
Setting up custom roleplay commands! These are unique server commands that return custom responses. For example, we'll be creating a hug command.

If you include {msg} when you create a new roleplay command, it will pass the message to your custom response. For example, if someone uses anni.hugs @user violently, then the bot will respond with @user hugs @user violently.

If you add more than one image/gif to a roleplay command, it will select one of the images at random for the response.

anni.ac.new to make a new roleplay command.
anni.ac.add to add an image/gif to the response.
anni.ac.edit to edit the text of an existing command.
anni.ac.remove to remove an image/gif from a command.
anni.ac.delete to delete an existing command.

anni.ac.new hugs *{user} hugs {msg}*

anni.ac.add hugs https://i.imgur.com/r9aU2xv.gif

anni.hugs

anni.hugs @User

subs.head: anni.action.add [command] [url]
subs.desc:
Adds an image/gif response to your action.
anni.help action for more information.
anni.action.add hug https://i.imgur.com/r9aU2xv.gif

subs.head: anni.action.del [command]
subs.desc:
Removes an action from your server.
anni.help action for more information.
anni.action.del hug

subs.head: anni.action.edit [command] [new response]
subs.desc:
Edits an action message on your server.
anni.help action for more information.
anni.action.edit hug *hugs {msg}*

subs.head: anni.action.new [command] [response]
subs.desc:
Makes a new action on your server.
anni.help action for more information.
anni.action.new hug * hugs {msg}*

subs.head: anni.action.rem [command] [url]
subs.desc:
Removes an image/gif response from your action.
anni.help action for more information.
anni.action.remove hug https://i.imgur.com/r9aU2xv.gif

mods.name: edit
mods.head: anni.edit [messageID] [content]
mods.desc:
Edits message with ID messageID to content
Message must be a message posted by the bot, bots cannot edit another user's message. Message must be in the same channel as the command.
content can be a text or an embed.
Embed Generator - Get Message IDs

anni.edit 606874363089649684 { 'title': 'Message!' }

mods.name: post
mods.head: anni.post [embed]
mods.desc:
Print a 'bulletin' (embed) in the channel.
You can use an embed generator like this one to help you quickly make your own bulletin/embed.

anni.post { 'title': 'Message!' }

mods.name: clear
mods.head: anni.clear [amount]
mods.desc:
Delete [amount] messages from the current channel.
anni.clear 10

mods.name: find
mods.head: anni.find [user]
mods.desc:
Attempts to find and display information regarding user.
anni.find @User

mods.name: remove
mods.head: anni.remove [amount] [user]
mods.desc:
Delete [amount] messages from the current channel. Optionally only delete [amount] messages from [user] sent the past 300 messages.
anni.remove 10

anni.remove 10 @User

admin.name: option
admin.head: anni.option.[action] [options]
admin.desc:
Manages guild profile options. Returns current profile options if no action provided. Be sure to check out the dashboard for easier option management.

anni.option.new to create a new option.
anni.option.set to edit a current option.
anni.option.rem to delete a profile option.

subs.head: anni.option.new  [tag] -[label] -[desc]
subs.desc:
Sets a custom profile option for your server. Set a tag (required), add a label (required) and then optionally add a description to explain the label. Be sure to check out the dashboard for easier option management.
The tag is used for setting the profile option. To use the example below, the set command would be anni.set tag [A Brief Intro]

anni.opt.new tag -Tagline -A Brief Intro

subs.head: anni.option.rem [tag]
subs.desc:
Removes option with tag tag.
Get tags by listing options with anni.opts

WARNING
Removing an option will also remove all user profile data associated with that option.

anni.opt.rem tag

subs.head: anni.option.set [tag] -[new label] -[new desc]
subs.desc:
Edits a profile option for your server. Pass the tag you find using anni.opt, and pass new options. Be sure to check out the dashboard for easier option management.
Editing an option will not overwrite user's profile data for that option. This lets you update the label or description without forcing users to update. To replace an option and force an update, anni.option.rem [tag] first.

anni.opt.set tag -Tagline -An Introduction

admin.name: announce
admin.head: anni.announce [message]
admin.desc:
Sets the message for birthday announcements.
Must include {user} or and optionally include {date}.
You can also pass off to disable birthday announcements.

anni.announce Hey!!! Happy Birthday !

admin.name: channel
admin.head: anni.channel [#channel]
admin.desc:
Sets the channel for birthday reminders/announcements.
You can also pass off to disable all reminders.

anni.channel #general-chat

admin.name: prefix
admin.head: anni.prefix [prefix]
admin.desc:
Sets the command prefix for your server.
This is anni. by default.

anni.prefix !

anni.prefix ?

Note: prefix cannot contain spaces.

admin.name: reminder
admin.head: anni.reminder [message]
admin.desc:
Sets the message for birthday reminders.
Must include {user} or and optionally include {date}.
You can also pass off to disable birthday reminders.

anni.reminder Hey listen, it's birthday next week on {date}

admin.name: suffix
admin.head: anni.suffix [suffix]
admin.desc:
Sets a command suffix for your server. This is separate and novel from the command prefix. Pass off to disable.
This is off by default.

anni.suffix .exe

anni.suffix .cmd

Note: suffix cannot contain spaces.

admin.name: setup
admin.head: anni.setup
admin.desc:
Returns info for setting up the server config.

anni.setup

admin.name: board
admin.head: anni.board [#channel]
admin.desc:
Sets the channel for starboard.
You can pass off to disable.

anni.board #general-chat

admin.name: count
admin.head: anni.amount [num]
admin.desc:
Sets the number of reactions to post to the starboard.

anni.amount 6

admin.name: emoji
admin.head: anni.emoji [emoji]
admin.desc:
Sets the emoji reaction for starboard.

anni.emoji :star:

admin.name: starboard
admin.head: anni.starboard
admin.desc:
Returns info for setting up the starboard.

anni.starboard
